serverless-cloud-function-application: 使用 CLS 触发器将消息转储至指定的 COS 存储桶
在使用本示例代码时需要在函数里修改用户的appid、secret_id、secret_key、bucket名
腾讯云无服务器云函数团队
This demo will connect CLS and consume message automatically. The SCF will write each message to txt by each line. Then SCF will name this file by time and upload this txt to COS bucket
Please change the appid,secret_id,secret_key,bucket name and region before you use it
